summary: In 16th-century Prague, a rabbi creates the Golem - a giant creature made of clay. Using sorcery, he brings the creature to life in order to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.
cast: Paul Wegener|Albert Steinrück|Lyda Salmonova|Ernst Deutsch|Hans Stürm|Max Kronert|Otto Gebühr|Dore Paetzold|Lothar Müthel|Greta Schröder|Loni Nest|Carl Ebert|Fritz Feld|Ursula Nest
title: El golem
